name: Carchery - LD41
description:
Throw cars off of a ramp and boost into the giant target! Closer into the middle for a higher score. Five attempts per round!

Controls
Forward / Spin Forward in Air -> W or Up Arrow
Back / Spin Backward in Air -> S or Down Arrow
Left / Twist Left in Air -> A or Left Arrow
Right /  Twist Right in Air -> D or Right Arrow
Boost / Spacebar

Submission for LD41.
